Medford.Alfred E. Robindreau House: The Alfred E. Robindreau House is a historic house at 28 Lafayette Street in Arlington, Massachusetts. This house, built c. 1920 and first occupied by a poultry dealer, is a rare well-preserved 1-1/2 story hip-roofed Craftsman/Bungalow-style house in a neighborhood generally filled with Shingle and Colonial Revival houses.
